issue.title: Error when editing metadata if user have no language set
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

An error appears when the user uses default JOOMLA language.

Catchable fatal error: Object of class stdClass could not be converted to string in /home/htdocs/www/tigeo/components/com_easysdi_catalog/libraries/easysdi/FormHtmlGenerator.php on line 807

fixed and commited in my 4.2.x branche

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
